plot: A serial killer, who has been photographed by accident by a teenage girl while he was doing his dirty job, will start a bloody hunting for the compromising negatives...
title: La ligne noire
plot_es: A serial killer, who has been photographed by accident by a teenage girl while he was doing his dirty job, will start a bloody hunting for the compromising negatives...
